amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to support any Amtrak route whose costs exceed 2 times its revenues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to support any Amtrak route whose costs exceed 2 times its revenues.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237 (Roll no. 315).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
